title: Dumb Question, but How do I Make a PBE Account?
body: I got excited when I heard signups were open cause I've wanted an account for the longest time but every time I go to the sign up page with the "Check My Eligibility" button and click it, it just very briefly flashes what looks like the log-in screen for the website and then brings me back to the sign-up page. I don't really understand what's going on. I'm currently honor level 5 so shouldn't it be working? I tried downloading the PBE client and seeing if I could get the account from there but no luck ether. Am I missing something? Is there some other requirement I need? Did I miss a deadline? If someone can explain please do.

replies.body: That signup site has been a bit overloaded from all of the traffic. If it still hasn't worked, let's try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) just to be safe and try again.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kYez3Aca,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-17T02:12:55.166+0000)
>
> That signup site has been a bit overloaded from all of the traffic. If it still hasn't worked, let's try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) just to be safe and try again.

Seems that everything's working now. Thanks a ton.
